  |- wi(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wceq(cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3)), w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))
  syl6bbr(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3))))
  bitr4d(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3))), wo(wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl6bb(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wo(wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs1, cun(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, cun(c2, c3))), wrex(hs1, cun(c2, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfn(c0, c1), wss(cun(c2, c3), c1))
  simp1(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))

  simpl(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  simpr(wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, cun(c2, c3), cv(hs0))
  rexun(hs1, c2, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  orbi12d(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  3adant3(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2)), wrex(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  3adant2(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c3)), wrex(hs1, c3, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c3, cv(hs0))
  elun(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, c3)))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wfn(c0, c1), wss(c2, c1), wss(c3, c1)))

thm unima(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1)→(c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3))=((c0 " c2)⋃(c0 " c3)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3)), ((c0 " c2)⋃(c0 " c3)), (c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  syl6bbr((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3)), hs0 ∈((c0 " c2)⋃(c0 " c3)), (hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)∨ hs0 ∈(c0 " c3)))
  bitr4d((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3)), (hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)∨ hs0 ∈(c0 " c3)), (∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)∨ ∃(hs1 ∈ c3,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  syl6bb((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3)), (∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)∨ ∃(hs1 ∈ c3,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)), ∃(hs1 ∈(c2 ⋃ c3),(c0 ` hs1)= hs0))
  syl2anc((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), (hs0 ∈(c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3))↔ ∃(hs1 ∈(c2 ⋃ c3),(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)), c0[Fn]c1, (c2 ⋃ c3)⊆ c1)
  simp1(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1)
  3adant1(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1, (c2 ⋃ c3)⊆ c1)
  unssd(c2, c3, c1, (c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  simpl(c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1)
  simpr(c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1)
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, (c2 ⋃ c3), hs0)
  rexun(hs1, c2, c3, (c0 ` hs1)= hs0)
  orbi12d((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 " c2), hs0 ∈(c0 " c3), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0), ∃(hs1 ∈ c3,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0))
  3adant3(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 " c2)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  3adant2(c0[Fn]c1, c2 ⊆ c1, c3 ⊆ c1, (hs0 ∈(c0 " c3)↔ ∃(hs1 ∈ c3,(c0 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  fvelimab(hs1, c0, c1, c3, hs0)
  elun(hs0, (c0 " c2), (c0 " c3))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 "(c2 ⋃ c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 " c2)⋃(c0 " c3)))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[Fn]c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c3 ⊆ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((c2 ⋃ c3))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

thm suprnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ c0 = sup(ran(c3), ℝ, <)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]c0))
  syl5eqel(c0, cr, sup(ran(c3), ℝ, <), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, sup(ran(c3), ℝ, <)∈ ℝ, ran(c3)⊆ ℝ, ran(c3)≠ ∅, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)))
  exlimdd(s0, w0, ran(c3)≠ ∅, s0 ∈ c1)
  nfne(s0, ran(c3), emptycls)
  nfrn(s0, c3)
  nfcxfr(s0, c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  nfmpt1(s0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0, s0 ∈ c1), c1 ≠ ∅)
  n0(s0, c1)
  suprcl(s1, hs0, ran(c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2[≤]c0)
  syl6breqr(c2, cle, c0, sup(ran(c3), ℝ, <), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl31anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2[≤]sup(ran(c3), ℝ, <), ran(c3)⊆ ℝ, ran(c3)≠ ∅, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)), c2 ∈ ran(c3))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, ran(c3)⊆ ℝ)
  syl(w0, ran(c3)⊆ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℝ))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  rnmptss(s0, c1, c2, cr, c3)
  ne0d(ran(c3), c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)))
  mpd(w0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)))
  rexlimd(s1, cr, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfre1(s1, cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1))
  3exp(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1))))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)), ∃(s1,(s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1))), s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1))
  simp2(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ran(c3), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)), hs0[≤]s1)
  syl3anc(((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1))∧ hs0 ∈ ran(c3)), hs0[≤]s1, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  simpl1(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), hs0 ∈ ran(c3))
  simpl3(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), hs0 ∈ ran(c3))
  adantl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)), hs0 ∈ ran(c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran(c3)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  elrnmpt(s0, hs0, universe, c3, c1, c2)
  mpd((w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)), hs0[≤]s1, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  simp3(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  rexlimd(s0, c1, (w0 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)), hs0 = c2, hs0[≤]s1)
  nf3an(s0, w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2))
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfra1(s0, c1, c2[≤]s1)
  nfre1(s0, c1, hs0 = c2)
  nfv(s0, hs0[≤]s1)
  3ad2ant2(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2), (s0 ∈ c1 →(hs0 = c2 → hs0[≤]s1)))
  3exp(∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2, hs0[≤]s1)
  eqbrtrd(hs0, cle, s1, c2, (∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 = c2))
  simp3(∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2)
  3adant3(∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1), s0 ∈ c1, hs0 = c2, c2[≤]s1)
  rspa(s0, c1, c2[≤]s1)
  19.8a(s1, (s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1)))
  df-rex(s1, cr, ∀(hs0 ∈ ran(c3), hs0[≤]s1))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ ran(c3), s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  elrnmpt1(s0, c1, c2, cr, c3)
  suprub(s1, hs0, ran(c3), c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2[≤]s1)))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, c3)

}

blocks.name: mptelpm
blocks.content: A function in maps-to notation is a partial map . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptelpm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)), wa(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3)))
  jca(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3))
  mpbid(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  feq2d(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  eqsstrd(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3, c0, w0)
  dmmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, cpm, c3)), wa(wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c3))), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c5))
  elpm2g(c2, c4, c3, c5, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mptelpm(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[p↦]c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[p↦]c3), (((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ c2)∧ dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ c3))
  jca(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ c2), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ c3)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ c2), ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): c0 → c2))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  feq2d((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c2, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  eqsstrd(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), c3, c0, w0)
  dmmptd(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  syl2anc(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[p↦]c3)↔(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1): dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))→ c2)∧ dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ c3)), c2 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c5)
  elpm2g(c2, c4, c3, c5, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
}

blocks.name: rnmptpr
blocks.content: Range of a function defined on an unordered pair. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(crn(c0), cpr(c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cpr(c3, c5), c7))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c7, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c5), wceq(c7, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crn(c0), cpr(c1, c2)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  3bitrd(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7))))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(c0)), wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  elrnmpt(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, cpr(c3, c5), c7)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c3, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c7)), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, c6))
  rexprg(s0, c3, c4, c5, c6, wceq(cv(hs0), c7), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c7, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c7, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  a1i(w0, wb(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  bicomi(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))
  elpr(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  dfcleq(hs0, crn(c0), cpr(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)= { c1, c2 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ { c3, c5 } ↦ c7)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c7 = c1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c5 → c7 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ran(c0)= { c1, c2 }, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ hs0 ∈ { c1, c2 })))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, (hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ hs0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  3bitrd(w0, hs0 ∈ ran(c0), hs0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, ∃(s0 ∈ { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7), (hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c2))
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7)))
  ax-mp((hs0 ∈ ran(c0)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7)), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elrnmpt(s0, hs0, universe, c0, { c3, c5 }, c7)
  syl2anc(w0, (∃(s0 ∈ { c3, c5 }, hs0 = c7)↔(hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c2)), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c6)
  rexprg(s0, c3, c4, c5, c6, hs0 = c7, hs0 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c7, c1, s0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c7, c2, s0 = c5)
  a1i(w0, ((hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c2)↔ hs0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  bicomi((hs0 = c1 ∨ hs0 = c2), hs0 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  elpr(hs0, c1, c2)
  vex(hs0)
  dfcleq(hs0, ran(c0), { c1, c2 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(c0))
  diff.hs0.c({ c1, c2 })
}

thm founiiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  a1i(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cuni(c2), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))))
  uniiun(hs0, c2)
  eqssd(ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wss(ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0)), ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mpd(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  simpr(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  foelrni(s0, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0))
  a1i(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  reximi(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqimss2(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  iunss2(hs0, s0, c2, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  syl(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wss(ciun(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), ciun(hs0, c2, cv(hs0))), wral(s0, c1, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, wfo(c0, c1, c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), c1, c0, c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  fof(c0, c1, c2)
  ssidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rspcev(hs0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2, wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  iunss2(s0, hs0, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wfo(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wfo.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wss(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm founiiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)→ ⋃ c2 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(⋃ c2, ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0), (c0 : c1 ↠ c2))
  a1i((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ⋃ c2 = ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0))
  uniiun(hs0, c2)
  eqssd(⋃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0), ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)), (c0 : c1 ↠ c2))
  syl((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆(c0 ` s0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c2, (c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆(c0 ` s0)))
  mpd(((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆(c0 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0), (c0 : c1 ↠ c2), hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpl((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), hs0 ∈ c2)
  simpr((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), hs0 ∈ c2)
  foelrni(s0, c0, c1, c2, hs0)
  a1i(((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆(c0 ` s0))))
  reximi(s0, c1, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ⊆(c0 ` s0))
  eqimss2((c0 ` s0), hs0)
  iunss2(hs0, s0, c2, c1, hs0, (c0 ` s0))
  syl((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ⋃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0))⊆ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)⊆ hs0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, (c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)⊆ hs0))
  syl2anc(((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ s0 ∈ c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)⊆ hs0), (c0 ` s0)∈ c2, (c0 ` s0)⊆(c0 ` s0))
  ffvelrnda(s0, c1, c0, c2, (c0 : c1 ↠ c2))
  fof(c0, c1, c2)
  ssidd((c0 ` s0), ((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  rspcev(hs0, (c0 ` s0), c2, (c0 ` s0)⊆(c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)⊆ hs0)
  sseq2(hs0, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0))
  iunss2(s0, hs0, c1, c2, (c0 ` s0), hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 : c1 ↠ c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` s0))
  diff.wfo.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s0)⊆(c0 ` s0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dffo3f
blocks.content: An onto mapping expressed in terms of function values. As ~ dffo3 but with less disjoint vars constraints. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dffo3f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

blocks.name: rnresss
blocks.content: The range of a restriction is a subset of the whole range. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: elrnmptd
blocks.content: The range of a function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: elrnmptf
blocks.content: The range of a function in maps-to notation. Same as ~ elrnmpt , but using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrnmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crn(c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, crn(c2), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)), wrex(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  rexbid(s0, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c0, c4))
  nfeq(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c3, wceq(c0, c4)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elrnmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ ran(c2)↔ ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0 = c4)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, ran(c2), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0 = c4), ∃(s0 ∈ c3, hs0 = c4))
  rexbid(s0, c3, hs0 = c0, hs0 = c4, c0 = c4)
  nfeq(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  eqeq1(hs0, c0, c4)
  rnmpt(hs0, s0, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c3, c0 = c4))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: rnmptssrn
blocks.content: Inclusion relation for two ranges expressed in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm rnmptssrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wcel(c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(c1, c3))), wcel(c1, c4))
  elrnmpt(s1, c1, c4, cmpt(s1, c2, c3), c2, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  rnmptss(s0, c0, c1, crn(cmpt(s1, c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.crn.s(s0, cmpt(s1, c2, c3))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptssrn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c1 = c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c1 = c3))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))↔ ∃(s1 ∈ c2, c1 = c3)), c1 ∈ c4)
  elrnmpt(s1, c1, c4, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c2, c3)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  rnmptss(s0, c0, c1, ran((s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c2, c3)
}

thm rnsnf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  fvexd(c0, c1, w0)

blocks.name: wessf1orn
blocks.content: Given a function ` F ` on a well-ordered domain ` A ` there exists a subset of ` A ` such that ` F ` restricted to such subset is injective and onto the range of ` F ` (without using the axiom of choice). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm wessf1orn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wf1o(cres(c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0), crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wwe(c3, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  wessf1ornlem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(hs0, crn(c1), crio(s0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0)))))), w0)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, crn(c1), crio(s0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wral(hs1, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(cv(hs0))), wn(wbr(cv(hs1), c3, cv(s0)))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

thm wessf1orn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ P(c0),((c1 |` s0): s0 ↔ ran(c1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Fn]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≤ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  wessf1ornlem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (hs0 ∈ ran(c1)↦ iota(s0 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 }), ∀(hs1 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 }), ¬ hs1[c3]s0))), w0)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ ran(c1)↦ iota(s0 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 }), ∀(hs1 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 }), ¬ hs1[c3]s0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: foelrnf
blocks.content: Property of a surjective function. As ~ foelrn but with less disjoint vars constraints. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm foelrnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c3, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))))
  simprbi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wral(hs0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))), wf(c0, c1, c2))

thm foelrnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (((c0 : c1 ↠ c2)∧ c3 ∈ c2)→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), c3 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))))
  simprbi((c0 : c1 ↠ c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))), (c0 : c1 → c2))
  dffo3f(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c3, ∃(s0 ∈ c1, hs0 =(c0 ` s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c3, hs0 =(c0 ` s0), c3 =(c0 ` s0))
  eqeq1(hs0, c3, (c0 ` s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c1, c3 =(c0 ` s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Elementhood in an image set. Same as ~ elrnmpt1s , but using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)

thm elrnmpt1sf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c1, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wceq(c2, c2))
  rspce(s0, c0, c1, wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c2, c5))
  nfth(s0, wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  eqeq2d(c2, c5, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  biimparc(wrex(s0, c1, wceq(c2, c5)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, crn(c4)))
  elrnmptf(s0, c2, c3, c4, c1, c5)
}

}

  3adant2(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wne(c4, emptycls))

blocks.pretty:
thm disjf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 |` c1): c1 ↔ c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c3, c4))
  ⊣ c1 = { s0 ∈ c3 | c4 ≠ ∅ }
  ⊣ c2 =(ran(c0)\ { ∅ })
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)

  simpr(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  r19.21bi(s0, c1, wfo(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))

  sylibr(wa(wral(s0, c1, wcel(c3, c2)), wral(s1, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s1), c3)))), wfo(c0, c1, c2), wa(wf(c0, c1, c2), wral(s1, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))))

blocks.name: disjinfi
blocks.content: Only a finite number of disjoint sets can have a nonempty intersection with a finite set ` C ` (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjinfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cfn), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wbr(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cdom, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn))
  syl2anc(wcel(c2, cfn), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn), wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))
  id(wcel(c2, cfn))
  a1i(wcel(c2, cfn), wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))
  ssfi(c2, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2))
  sylc(w0, wbr(crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), cdom, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2)), wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), universe), wfo(cmpt(hs0, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crio(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))), cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), universe), wa(wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfn)))
  jca(w0, wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2), wcel(c2, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2))
  ssexg(cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), c2, cfn)
  sylibr(w0, wfo(cmpt(hs0, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crio(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))), cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls))), wa(wral(hs0, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), wcel(crio(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)))), wral(hs1, crab(s0, c0, wne(cin(c1, c2), emptycls)), wrex(hs0, cin(cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), c2), wceq(cv(hs1), crio(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))))))))

blocks.name: fvovco
blocks.content: Value of the composition of an operator, with a given function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)

thm fvovco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cxp(c4, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))), w0)
  fveq2d(c0, cfv(c1, c2), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, c2), cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cxp(c4, c5)))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, cxp(c4, c5), c3, w0)
  1st2nd2(cfv(c1, c2), c4, c5)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, c2))), wf(c1, c3, cxp(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, c3))
  fvco3(c1, c3, cxp(c4, c5), c2, c0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), cfv(c0, cop(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))))))
  df-ov(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))
}

  elpwi(cv(hs1), cn)

  mpbid(wa(wfo(cv(hs0), cn, c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0)))), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdm(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), c0), wf1o(cres(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), crn(cv(hs0))))

blocks.pretty:
thm ssnnf1octb(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≼]_om ∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpd((c0[≼]_om ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))), ∃(hs0,(hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0)))
  nnfoctb(hs0, c0)
  exlimdv(hs0, (c0[≼]_om ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), (hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))))
  a1i((c0[≼]_om ∧ c0 ≠ ∅), ((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0)→ ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0)))))
  mpd((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))), ∃(hs1 ∈ P(ℕ),((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0))))
  wessf1orn(hs1, cn, hs0, universe, clt, (hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0))
  fofn(hs0, cn, c0)
  a1i((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), ℕ ∈ 𝕌)
  nnex()
  a1i((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), < ≤ ℕ)
  ltwenn()
  rexlimdv(hs1, P(ℕ), (hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), ((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0)), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))))
  3exp((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), hs1 ∈ P(ℕ), ((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0)), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))))
  syl2anc(((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ P(ℕ)∧((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0))), ∃(s0,(dom(s0)⊆ ℕ ∧(s0 : dom(s0)↔ c0))), dom((hs0 |` hs1))⊆ ℕ, ((hs0 |` hs1): dom((hs0 |` hs1))↔ c0))
  3adant1((hs0 : ℕ ↠ c0), hs1 ∈ P(ℕ), ((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0)), dom((hs0 |` hs1))⊆ ℕ)
  eqsstrd(dom((hs0 |` hs1)), cn, hs1, (hs1 ∈ P(ℕ)∧((hs0 |` hs1): hs1 ↔ ran(hs0))))

thm mapdm0OLD(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))

  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  elmapg(c0, c1, emptycls, universe, cv(hs0))
  f0bi(cv(hs0), c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wral(hs0, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), wne(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), emptycls))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wne(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0))
  f0(c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls)), wf(emptycls, emptycls, c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))

  0ex()
  elmapg(c0, c1, emptycls, universe, emptycls)
  ne0i(emptycls, co(c0, cmap, emptycls))

thm mapdm0OLD(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0[↦]∅)= { ∅ })
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ∈ c1, (c0[↦]∅)= { ∅ }, ∀(hs0 ∈(c0[↦]∅), hs0 = ∅))

  syl(c0 ∈ c1, ((c0[↦]∅)= { ∅ } ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈(c0[↦]∅), hs0 = ∅)), (c0[↦]∅)≠ ∅)
  syl(c0 ∈ c1, (c0[↦]∅)≠ ∅, ∅ ∈(c0[↦]∅))

  f0(c0)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ c1, (∅ ∈(c0[↦]∅)↔(∅ : ∅ → c0)), c0 ∈ c1, ∅ ∈ 𝕌)
  id(c0 ∈ c1)

thm projf1o(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 ↔({ c2 } × c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ < c2, s0 >)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : c1 ↔({ c2 } × c1)), ((c0 : c1 ↣({ c2 } × c1))∧(c0 : c1 ↠({ c2 } × c1))))
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ↣({ c2 } × c1)), (c0 : c1 ↠({ c2 } × c1)))

  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 →({ c2 } × c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1))))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c1, c1, w0, ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1))
  3expb(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, ((c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)→ hs0 = hs1))
  ex((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)), hs0 = hs1, w0, < c2, hs0 > = < c2, hs1 >)
  simpl1(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  3eqtrd(< c2, hs0 >, < c2, hs1 >, (c0 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1)∧(c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1)))
  adantr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), < c2, hs0 > =(c0 ` hs0))
  3adant3(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, < c2, hs0 > =(c0 ` hs0))
  eqcomd(< c2, hs0 >, (c0 ` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  simpr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1))
  adantr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` hs1)= < c2, hs1 >)
  3adant2(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs1 ∈ c1, (c0 ` hs1)= < c2, hs1 >)
  fvmptd3(hs0, c0, hs1, < c2, hs1 >, c1, < c2, hs0 >, universe, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  opeq2(hs0, hs1, c2)
  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c1), < c2, hs1 > ∈ 𝕌)

blocks.name: fvmap
blocks.content: Function value for a member of a set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c2), w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  id(w0)
  ffvelrnda(c1, c4, c0, c2, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(c0, c4, c2), wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c2, cmap, c4)), wf(c0, c4, c2)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  elmapg(c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c2[↦]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)∈ c2, w0, c1 ∈ c4)
  id(w0)
  ffvelrnda(c1, c4, c0, c2, w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0 : c4 → c2), c0 ∈(c2[↦]c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∈(c2[↦]c4)↔(c0 : c4 → c2)), c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5)
  elmapg(c2, c3, c4, c5, c0)
}

blocks.name: fidmfisupp
blocks.content: A function with a finite domain is finitely supported. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fidmfisupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn, cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, csupp, c1), cima(ccnv(c0), cdif(universe, csn(c1)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  suppimacnv(c0, universe, c1, c4)
  fisuppfi(c0, cdif(universe, csn(c1)), c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfsupp, c1), wcel(co(c0, csupp, c1), cfn)), wfun(c0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, c4))
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wf(c0, c2, c3), wcel(c2, cfn))
  fex(c0, c2, c3, cfn)
  funisfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fidmfisupp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[finSupp]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[finSupp]c1, (c0[supp]c1)∈ Fin)
  eqeltrd((c0[supp]c1), cfn, (`' c0 "(𝕌 \ { c1 })), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[supp]c1)=(`' c0 "(𝕌 \ { c1 })), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c4)
  suppimacnv(c0, universe, c1, c4)
  fisuppfi(c0, (𝕌 \ { c1 }), c2, c3, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[finSupp]c1 ↔(c0[supp]c1)∈ Fin), Fun(c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ c4)
  ffund(c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : c2 → c3), c2 ∈ Fin)
  fex(c0, c2, c3, cfn)
  funisfsupp(c0, universe, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: mpct
blocks.content: The exponentiation of a countable set to a finite set is countable. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 24-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpct(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmap, c1), cdom, com))

} = {
  findcard2d(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, w0, wbr(co(c0, cmap, c1), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com))
  breq1d(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com, co(c0, cmap, emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))

  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0, cmap)
  breq1d(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com, co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0, cmap)
  breq1d(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com, co(c0, cmap, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cmap)
  eqbrtrd(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), cdom, com, csn(emptycls), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), csn(emptycls)), wcel(c0, universe))
  mapdm0(c0, universe)
  a1i(w0, wbr(csn(emptycls), cdom, com))
  ax-mp(wbr(csn(emptycls), cdom, com), wcel(csn(emptycls), cfn))
  snfi(emptycls)
  fict(csn(emptycls))
  ex(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))))), wbr(cxp(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com))
  syl31anc(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))))), wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wcel(csn(cv(hs2)), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), emptycls))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  vex(hs1)
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com)), wcel(csn(cv(hs2)), universe))
  snex(cv(hs2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1)))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wcel(c0, universe))
  ad2antlr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1)))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), emptycls))
  adantl(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), emptycls), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))))

  disjsn(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  mapunen(cv(hs1), universe, csn(cv(hs2)), universe, c0, universe)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com)), wbr(cxp(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))), cdom, com))
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1))))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), cdif(c1, cv(hs1)))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))), cdom, com))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))), cdom, com), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))), cen, c0), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  mapsnend(c0, cv(hs2), universe, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  ctex(c0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), universe))
  vex(hs2)
  endomtr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))), c0, com)
  xpct(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2))))
  endomtr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cxp(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs2)))), com)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, c1), cdom, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, emptycls), cdom, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs1)), cdom, com))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cdom, com))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com))
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, cv(hs0)), cdom, com))
}

thm mpct(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[↦]c1)[≼]_om)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≼]_om)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
} = {
  findcard2d(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, w0, (c0[↦]c1)[≼]_om, (c0[↦]hs0)[≼]_om, (c0[↦]∅)[≼]_om, (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))[≼]_om)
  breq1d((c0[↦]hs0), cdom, com, (c0[↦]∅), hs0 = ∅)
  oveq2(hs0, emptycls, c0, cmap)
  breq1d((c0[↦]hs0), cdom, com, (c0[↦]hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, hs1, c0, cmap)
  breq1d((c0[↦]hs0), cdom, com, (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 })), hs0 =(hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))
  oveq2(hs0, (hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }), c0, cmap)
  breq1d((c0[↦]hs0), cdom, com, (c0[↦]c1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, c0, cmap)
  eqbrtrd((c0[↦]∅), cdom, com, { ∅ }, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[↦]∅)= { ∅ }, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mapdm0(c0, universe)
  a1i(w0, { ∅ }[≼]_om)
  ax-mp({ ∅ }[≼]_om, { ∅ } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(emptycls)
  fict({ ∅ })
  ex((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1))), (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))[≼]_om)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)))∧(c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om), (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))[≼]_om, (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))[≅]((c0[↦]hs1)×(c0[↦]{ hs2 })), ((c0[↦]hs1)×(c0[↦]{ hs2 }))[≼]_om)
  syl31anc(((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)))∧(c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om), (c0[↦](hs1 ⋃ { hs2 }))[≅]((c0[↦]hs1)×(c0[↦]{ hs2 })), hs1 ∈ 𝕌, { hs2 } ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅)
  a1i(((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)))∧(c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om), hs1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs1)
  a1i(((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)))∧(c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om), { hs2 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(hs2)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)), (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ad2antlr(w0, (hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)), (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅)
  adantl(hs1 ⊆ c1, hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1), (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅)
  sylibr(hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1), (hs1 ⋂ { hs2 })= ∅, ¬ hs2 ∈ hs1)
  eldifn(hs2, c1, hs1)
  disjsn(hs1, hs2)
  mapunen(hs1, universe, { hs2 }, universe, c0, universe)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)))∧(c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om), ((c0[↦]hs1)×(c0[↦]{ hs2 }))[≼]_om, (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, (c0[↦]{ hs2 })[≼]_om)
  simpr((w0 ∧(hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1))), (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs1 ⊆ c1 ∧ hs2 ∈(c1 \ hs1)), (c0[↦]hs1)[≼]_om, (c0[↦]{ hs2 })[≼]_om)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[↦]{ hs2 })[≼]_om, (c0[↦]{ hs2 })[≅]c0, c0[≼]_om)
  mapsnend(c0, hs2, universe, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0[≼]_om)
  ctex(c0)
  a1i(w0, hs2 ∈ 𝕌)

  xpct((c0[↦]hs1), (c0[↦]{ hs2 }))

blocks.name: cnmetcoval
blocks.content: Value of the distance function of the metric space of complex numbers, composed with a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnmetcoval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cmin, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c0, ccom(cabs, cmin))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c3, cxp(cc, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), c2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cmin, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)))), co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), w0)
  fvovco(c0, c1, c2, c3, cc, cc, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), c0, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cmin, cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2))))), wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)), cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cxp(cc, cc)))
  xp1st(cfv(c1, c2), cc, cc)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c1, c2), cxp(cc, cc)))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c2, cxp(cc, cc), c3, w0)
  xp2nd(cfv(c1, c2), cc, cc)
  cnmetdval(cfv(c1st, cfv(c1, c2)), cfv(c2nd, cfv(c1, c2)), c0)
}

blocks.name: fcomptss
blocks.content: Express composition of two functions as a maps-to applying both in sequence. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fcomptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(ccom(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wf(c0, c4, c5), wf(c1, c2, c4))
  fssd(c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  fcompt(s0, c0, c4, c5, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fcomptss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` s0))))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c4 → c5))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∘ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 `(c1 ` s0))), (c0 : c4 → c5), (c1 : c2 → c4))
  fssd(c1, c2, c4, c3, w0)
  fcompt(s0, c0, c4, c5, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: elmapsnd
blocks.content: Membership in a set exponentiated to a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmapsnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, csn(c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, csn(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, cmap, csn(c2))), wf(c0, csn(c2), c1))
  sylibr(w0, wf(c0, csn(c2), c1), wa(wfn(c0, csn(c2)), wral(hs0, csn(c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))))
  jca(w0, wfn(c0, csn(c2)), wral(hs0, csn(c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, csn(c2), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c0, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs0), c2, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c2)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), c1))
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, csn(c2), c1)
  elmapd(c0, c1, csn(c2), c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c2), universe))
  snex(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elmapsnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]{ c2 })
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ` c2)∈ c1)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), (c0 : { c2 } → c1))
  sylibr(w0, (c0 : { c2 } → c1), (c0[Fn]{ c2 } ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ { c2 },(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1)))
  jca(w0, c0[Fn]{ c2 }, ∀(hs0 ∈ { c2 },(c0 ` hs0)∈ c1))
  ralrimiva(hs0, { c2 }, w0, (c0 ` hs0)∈ c1)
  eqeltrd((c0 ` hs0), c1, (c0 ` c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ { c2 }))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ { c2 }, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c0, hs0, c2, hs0 ∈ { c2 })
  elsni(hs0, c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ { c2 }, (c0 ` c2)∈ c1)
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, { c2 }, c1)
  elmapd(c0, c1, { c2 }, c3, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, { c2 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c2 })
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: mapss2
blocks.content: Subset inheritance for set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  ex(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, c4), wss(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c4))
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  mapss(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  ex(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
  mpd(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wss(c0, c1), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  n0(hs0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c0, c1))
  ex(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(c0, c1), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  ad4ant13(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  eqcomd(cv(hs1), cfv(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  fvmptd(hs2, cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs1), universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqidd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  eqidd(cv(hs1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  vex(hs1)
  ffvelrnd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  adantlr(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c1), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  sseldd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c1, cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2), wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simplr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c2, c0))
  fmpttd(hs2, c2, cv(hs1), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2))
  elmapd(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c0, c2, c3, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c2, c5))
  elmapi(cmpt(hs2, c2, cv(hs1)), c1, c2)
  simplr(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  dfss3(hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm mapss2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ⊆ c1 ↔(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ≠ ∅)
} = {
  impbid(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))
  ex(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c0 ⊆ c1), (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), c1 ∈ c4, c0 ⊆ c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ∈ c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ⊆ c1)
  mapss(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  ex(w0, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), c0 ⊆ c1)
  mpd((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)), c0 ⊆ c1, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c2))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c2), c2 ≠ ∅)
  n0(hs0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, (w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)), hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ⊆ c1)
  ex((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)), hs0 ∈ c2, c0 ⊆ c1)
  sylibr(((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs0 ∈ c2), c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c0, ((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs1 ∈ c1)
  eqeltrd(hs1, c1, ((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)` hs0), (((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  ad4ant13(w0, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 =((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)` hs0))
  eqcomd(hs1, ((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  fvmptd(hs2, (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), hs0, hs1, c2, hs1, universe, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eqidd((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eqidd(hs1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs2 = hs0))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), hs1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs1)
  ffvelrnd((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), hs0, c1, c2, (((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  adantlr((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)), hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c0, ((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1): c2 → c1))
  syl(((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0), ((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1): c2 → c1), (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)∈(c1[↦]c2))
  sseldd((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), (c1[↦]c2), (c0[↦]c2), ((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  simplr(w0, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), hs1 ∈ c0)
  adantlr(w0, (c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), hs1 ∈ c0, (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)∈(c0[↦]c2))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), (hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1)∈(c0[↦]c2), ((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1): c2 → c0))
  fmpttd(hs2, c2, hs1, c0, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  simplr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, hs2 ∈ c2)
  elmapd((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), c0, c2, c3, c5, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, c0 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c5)
  elmapi((hs2 ∈ c2 ↦ hs1), c1, c2)
  simplr((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)), hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c0)
  dfss3(hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
  diff.hs1.w(((w0 ∧(c0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: fsneq
blocks.content: Equality condition for two functions defined on a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, csn(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c4))
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c0, c4), wfn(c1, c4))
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c4, c1)
  impbid(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  ex(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, c4), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  adantr(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c2, c4))
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csn(c2), c4))
  eqcomi(csn(c2), c4)
  simpr(w0, wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  ex(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  adantll(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wa(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, c2)))
  fveq2d(c0, cv(hs0), c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantl(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, c2)))
  fveq2d(c1, cv(hs0), c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)))
  eleq2i(cv(hs0), c4, csn(c2))
  velsn(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsneq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 = c1 ↔(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c4 = { c2 }
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Fn]c4)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))), c0[Fn]c4, c1[Fn]c4)
  eqfnfv(hs0, c0, c4, c1)
  impbid(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  ex(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), c2 ∈ c4, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  adantr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)), c2 ∈ c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, { c2 }, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ { c2 }, c2 ∈ c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, { c2 } = c4)
  eqcomi({ c2 }, c4)
  simpr(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  rspcva(hs0, c2, c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  eqeq12d((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4,(c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c4, (w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)), (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  adantll(w0, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ∈ c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  3eqtr4d((c0 ` hs0), (c1 ` hs0), (c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2), ((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  simpl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ∈ c4)
  adantl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ∈ c4, (c0 ` hs0)=(c0 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c0, hs0, c2, hs0 ∈ c4)
  adantl((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), hs0 ∈ c4, (c1 ` hs0)=(c1 ` c2))
  fveq2d(c1, hs0, c2, hs0 ∈ c4)
  sylib(hs0 ∈ c4, hs0 = c2, hs0 ∈ { c2 })
  biimpi(hs0 ∈ c4, hs0 ∈ { c2 })
  eleq2i(hs0, c4, { c2 })
  velsn(hs0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2)))
}

blocks.name: difmap
blocks.content: Difference of two sets exponentiations. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm difmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wral(hs0, co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  eldifd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))))
  sseldd(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wcel(c0, c3), wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0))
  difssd(c0, c1, w0)
  mapss(c0, c3, cdif(c0, c1), c2)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)))
  mtbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sylib(w0, wex(hs1, wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  n0(hs1, c2)
  exlimdv(hs1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wn(wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  pm2.65da(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  adantll(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1, c2, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))

  syl(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wn(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c1)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cdif(c0, c1)))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cdif(c0, c1), c2, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wf(cv(hs0), c2, cdif(c0, c1)))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1), c2)

  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5))

blocks.name: unirnmap
blocks.content: Given a subset of a set exponentiation, the base set can be restricted. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm unirnmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c3, cmap, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, crn(cuni(c0))))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, crn(cuni(c0))), wa(wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuni(c0))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuni(c0)))))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuni(c0))))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cuni(c0)), ciun(hs2, c0, crn(cv(hs2))), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ciun(hs2, c0, crn(cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs2, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wrex(hs2, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs0))))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0), crn(cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, crn(cv(hs0))), wfn(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wfn(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c3, cmap, c1)))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c0, co(c3, cmap, c1), w0)
  elmapfn(cv(hs0), c3, c1)
  dffn3(cv(hs0), c1)
  rspcev(hs2, cv(hs0), c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2))))
  eleq2d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs2)), crn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  rneq(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))
  eliun(hs2, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0, crn(cv(hs2)))
  rnuni(hs2, c0)
  ffnfv(hs1, cv(hs0), c1, crn(cuni(c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, crn(cuni(c0)))))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), crn(cuni(c0)), c1, universe, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(crn(cuni(c0)), universe), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssexd(c0, co(c3, cmap, c1), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c3, cmap, c1, w0)
  uniexg(c0, universe)
  rnexg(cuni(c0), universe)

  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), crn(cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cuni(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm unirnmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c3[↦]c1))
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 ⊆(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w0, hs0 ∈(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1), (hs0 : c1 → ran(⋃ c0)))
  sylibr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 : c1 → ran(⋃ c0)), (hs0[Fn]c1 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(⋃ c0))))
  jca((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[Fn]c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(⋃ c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(⋃ c0))
  syl6eleqr((hs0 ` hs1), ran(⋃ c0), ⋃(hs2 ∈ c0, ran(hs2)), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  sylibr(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c1), (hs0 ` hs1)∈ ⋃(hs2 ∈ c0, ran(hs2)), ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs2)))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)∧ hs1 ∈ c1), ∃(hs2 ∈ c0,(hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs2)), hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs0))
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  ffvelrnda(hs1, c1, hs0, ran(hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  sylib((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 : c1 → ran(hs0)), hs0[Fn]c1)
  syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[Fn]c1, hs0 ∈(c3[↦]c1))
  sselda(hs0, c0, (c3[↦]c1), w0)
  elmapfn(hs0, c3, c1)
  dffn3(hs0, c1)
  rspcev(hs2, hs0, c0, (hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs0), (hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs2))
  eleq2d((hs0 ` hs1), ran(hs2), ran(hs0), hs2 = hs0)
  rneq(hs2, hs0)
  eliun(hs2, (hs0 ` hs1), c0, ran(hs2))
  rnuni(hs2, c0)
  ffnfv(hs1, hs0, c1, ran(⋃ c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈(ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1)↔(hs0 : c1 → ran(⋃ c0))))
  elmapd(hs0, ran(⋃ c0), c1, universe, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, ran(⋃ c0)∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(w0, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexd(c0, (c3[↦]c1), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c3, cmap, c1, w0)
  uniexg(c0, universe)
  rnexg(⋃ c0, universe)
  dfss3(hs0, c0, (ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.w((hs0 ` hs1)∈ ran(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c((hs0 ` hs1))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(ran(⋃ c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((ran(⋃ c0)[↦]c1))
}

blocks.name: inmap
blocks.content: Intersection of two sets exponentiations. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm inmap(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  eqssd(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wral(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2)), wa(wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1)))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  fin(cv(hs0), c1, c0, c2)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, cin(c0, c2))))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2), c1, universe, c5, w0)
  ssexd(cin(c0, c2), c0, c3, w0)
  dfss3(hs0, cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))
  ssind(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c0, cmap, c1)), wcel(c0, c3), wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c0, c2), c0))
  inss1(c0, c2)
  mapss(c0, c3, cin(c0, c2), c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)), wcel(c2, c4), wss(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  inss2(c0, c2)
  mapss(c2, c4, cin(c0, c2), c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(co(c0, cmap, c1), co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cin(c0, c2), cmap, c1))
}
