blocks.name: fsneqrn
blocks.content: Equality condition for two functions defined on a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsneqrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, csn(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c1, c4))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  ex(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  eleqtrd(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1), crn(c0), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c0)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c2, crn(c0), c4, w0)
  sylib(w0, wf(c0, c4, crn(c0)), wfn(c0, c4))
  dffn3(c0, c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqcomd(csn(c2), c4, w0)
  rneqd(c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  ex(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, c2), csn(cfv(c1, c2))))
  eleqtrd(cfv(c0, c2), csn(cfv(c1, c2)), crn(c1), wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wceq(crn(c1), csn(cfv(c1, c2))))
  rnsnf(c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(c1, csn(c2), universe), wf(c1, c4, universe))
  sylib(w0, wf(c1, c4, universe), wfn(c1, c4))
  dffn2(c1, c4)
  feq2d(c1, c4, universe, csn(c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c4, csn(c2)))
  elsni(cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2))
  fsneq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wfn(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c2), crn(c1)), wfn(c1, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsneqrn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 = c1 ↔(c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c4 = { c2 }
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[Fn]c4)
} = {
  impbid(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1))
  ex(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1))
  eleqtrd((c0 ` c2), ran(c1), ran(c0), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c0))
  ffvelrnd(c0, c2, ran(c0), c4, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 : c4 → ran(c0)), c0[Fn]c4)
  dffn3(c0, c4)
  eleqtrd(c2, c4, { c2 }, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ { c2 }, c2 ∈ c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqcomd({ c2 }, c4, w0)
  rneqd(c0, c1, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
  ex(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1), c0 = c1)
  mpbird((w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1)), c0 = c1, (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2))
  syl((w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1)), (c0 ` c2)=(c1 ` c2), (c0 ` c2)∈ {(c1 ` c2)})
  eleqtrd((c0 ` c2), {(c1 ` c2)}, ran(c1), (w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1)))
  simpr(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1), ran(c1)= {(c1 ` c2)})
  rnsnf(c1, c2, c3, universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c1 : { c2 } → 𝕌), (c1 : c4 → 𝕌))
  sylib(w0, (c1 : c4 → 𝕌), c1[Fn]c4)
  dffn2(c1, c4)
  feq2d(c1, c4, universe, { c2 }, w0)
  a1i(w0, c4 = { c2 })
  elsni((c0 ` c2), (c1 ` c2))
  fsneq(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (w0 ∧(c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1)))
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1), c2 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1), c0[Fn]c4)
  adantr(w0, (c0 ` c2)∈ ran(c1), c1[Fn]c4)
}

blocks.name: difmapsn
blocks.content: Difference of two sets exponentiatiated to a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm difmapsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c5))
} = {
  eqssd(cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1))), wral(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cdif(c0, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  eldifd(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c2))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c2), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  jca(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2))
  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c2), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))))
  syl(w0, wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c2), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))), wcel(c1, c5))
  fsn2g(c1, c5, cv(hs0), c2)
  elmapd(cv(hs0), c2, csn(c1), c4, universe, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wcel(c2, c4))
  a1i(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2)), wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c2), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))))
  eldifn(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))))
  eldifi(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)))), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1))))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c0))
  elmapi(cv(hs0), c0, csn(c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1))), wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))))
  syl(w0, wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))), wcel(c1, c5))
  fsn2g(c1, c5, cv(hs0), c0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))))
  syl(w0, wb(wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c1), cdif(c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), c1)))))), wcel(c1, c5))
  fsn2g(c1, c5, cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1))), wf(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cdif(c0, c2))))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c2), csn(c1), universe, universe, w0)
  ssexd(cdif(c0, c2), c0, c3, w0)
  difssd(c0, c2, w0)
  dfss3(hs0, cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))), co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1)))
  difmap(c0, c2, csn(c1), c3, c4, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(csn(c1), universe))
  snex(c1)
  snn0d(c1, c5, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), co(c2, cmap, csn(c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cdif(c0, c2), cmap, csn(c1)))
}

blocks.name: mapssbi
blocks.content: Subset inheritance for set exponentiation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapssbi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, emptycls))
} = {
  impbid(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  ex(w0, wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wss(c0, c1)), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, c4), wss(c0, c1))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, c1), wcel(c1, c4))
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  mapss(c1, c4, c0, c2)
  ex(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wss(c0, c1))
  condan(wa(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wss(c0, c1), wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  simplr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wn(wss(c0, c1)))
  adantlr(w0, wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wn(wss(c0, c1)), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  adantl(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  biimpi(wn(wss(c0, c1)), wrex(hs0, c0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nssrex(hs0, c0, c1)
  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wn(wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), c2, c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), c2, c0))
  fconst6g(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), c2, c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), c2, c0)), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c5))
  elmapg(c0, c3, c2, c5, cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))))
  3adant2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  pm2.65da(wa(w0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantlr(w0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  snelmap(hs0, c1, c2, c5, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c2, c5))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wne(c2, emptycls))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  simplr(w0, wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  nelss(cxp(c2, csn(cv(hs0))), co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wn(wss(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wss(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))))
}

blocks.name: unirnmapsn
blocks.content: Equality theorem for a subset of a set exponentiation, where the exponent is a singleton. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm unirnmapsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, csn(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c4, cmap, c1)))
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, c0, co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1), w0)
  unirnmap(c0, c1, universe, c4, w0)
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), crn(cv(hs1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), crn(cv(hs1)))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1)))
  eleq12i(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1), cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1))
  equid(hs0)
  oveq1i(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1, ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))))
  rnuni(hs1, c0)
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1))), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), crn(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1)))))
  ffvelrnd(cv(hs0), c2, ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1))))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c1, ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1)))))
  elmapd(cv(hs0), ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), c1, universe, universe, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wral(hs1, c0, wcel(crn(cv(hs1)), universe)))
  ssexd(c0, co(c4, cmap, c1), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c4, cmap, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(crn(cv(hs1)), universe)))
  rgen(hs1, c0, wcel(crn(cv(hs1)), universe))
  rnexg(cv(hs1), c0)
  iunexg(hs1, c0, universe, crn(cv(hs1)), universe)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  eqeltri(c1, universe, csn(c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(hs1, c0, crn(cv(hs1))), cmap, c1)), wcel(c2, c1))
  syl6eleqr(c2, c1, csn(c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eliun(hs1, cfv(cv(hs0), c2), c0, crn(cv(hs1)))
  rexlimdv(hs1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), crn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(crn(cuni(c0)), cmap, c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wi(wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c2), crn(cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), w0, wfn(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: iunmapss
blocks.content: The indexed union of set exponentiations is a subset of the set exponentiation of the indexed union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iunmapss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(ciun(s0, c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciun(s0, c0, co(c1, cmap, c2)), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wss(co(c1, cmap, c2), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2))))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wss(co(c1, cmap, c2), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(co(c1, cmap, c2), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wss(co(c1, cmap, c2), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, c2)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wss(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c4))
  iunexg(s0, c0, c3, c1, c4)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wss(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  ssiun2(s0, c0, c1)

  ssexd(c0, co(c4, cmap, csn(c2)), universe, w0)

  a1i(w0, wral(s0, c0, wcel(crn(cv(s0)), universe)))

  syl(w0, wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqtri(c1, ciun(hs0, c0, crn(cv(hs0))), ciun(s0, c0, crn(cv(s0))))
  idi(wceq(c1, ciun(s0, c0, crn(cv(s0)))))
  cbviunv(s0, hs0, c0, crn(cv(s0)), crn(cv(hs0)))
  rneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  eliun(hs0, cfv(cv(s0), c2), c0, crn(cv(hs0)))
  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  3exp(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), w3a(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0)))))
  mpbird(w3a(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0))))
  simp3(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0))))
  fsneqrn(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2, c3, csn(c2), w3a(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), c2), crn(cv(hs0)))))

thm ssmapsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c4[↦]{ c2 }))
  ⊣ c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, c0 =(c1[↦]{ c2 }), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })))
  impbid(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  elmapsnd(s0, c1, c2, universe, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eleqr((s0 ` c2), c1, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  sseldd((s0 ` c2), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)), ran(s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)))
  ssiun2(s0, c0, ran(s0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(s0), s0[Fn]{ c2 }, c2 ∈ { c2 })
  ffnd(s0, { c2 }, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (s0 : { c2 } → c4), s0 ∈(c4[↦]{ c2 }))
  sselda(s0, c0, (c4[↦]{ c2 }), w0)
  elmapi(s0, c4, { c2 })
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ { c2 })
  fnfvelrn(s0, { c2 }, c2)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), s0 ∈ c0)
  mpd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), s0 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)))
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)), (s0 ` c2)∈ ⋃(hs0 ∈ c0, ran(hs0)))
  syl6eleq((s0 ` c2), ⋃(hs0 ∈ c0, ran(hs0)), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })))
  fvmap(s0, c2, c1, universe, { c2 }, universe, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd(c1, universe, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)), w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)))
  syl(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0))∈ 𝕌, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)∈ 𝕌)))
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)∈ 𝕌))
  ssexd(c0, (c4[↦]{ c2 }), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c4, cmap, { c2 }, w0)
  a1i(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)∈ 𝕌))
  rgen(s0, c0, ran(s0)∈ 𝕌)
  rnexg(s0, c0)
  iunexg(s0, c0, universe, ran(s0), universe)
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), { c2 } ∈ 𝕌)
  snex(c2)
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), c2 ∈ { c2 })
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ { c2 }, c2 ∈ c3)
  snidg(c2, c3)
  eqtri(c1, ⋃(hs0 ∈ c0, ran(hs0)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)))
  idi(c1 = ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ran(s0)))
  cbviunv(s0, hs0, c0, ran(s0), ran(hs0))
  rneq(s0, hs0)
  eliun(hs0, (s0 ` c2), c0, ran(hs0))
  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0), s0 ∈ c0)
  3exp((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0), s0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd(s0, c0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)))
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)), s0 = hs0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0))
  simp3((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0))
  fsneqrn(s0, hs0, c2, c3, { c2 }, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)))
  syl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)), c2 ∈ c3, w0)
  simp1l(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0))
  eqid({ c2 })
  syl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))∧ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0)), s0[Fn]{ c2 }, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  simp1r(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0))
  elmapfn(s0, c1, { c2 })
  3adant1r(w0, s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 }), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0), hs0[Fn]{ c2 })
  3adant3(w0, hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0), hs0[Fn]{ c2 })
  syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), hs0[Fn]{ c2 }, hs0 ∈(c4[↦]{ c2 }))
  sselda(hs0, c0, (c4[↦]{ c2 }), w0)
  elmapfn(hs0, c4, { c2 })
  simp2((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })), hs0 ∈ c0, (s0 ` c2)∈ ran(hs0))
  dfcleqf(s0, c0, (c1[↦]{ c2 }))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfov(s0, c1, cmap, { c2 })
  nfcv(s0, cmap)
  nfcv(s0, { c2 })
  diff.crn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran(s0))
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c1[↦]{ c2 })))
  diff.hs0.w(s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

blocks.name: iunmapsn
blocks.content: The indexed union of set exponentiations to a singleton is equal to the set exponentiation of the indexed union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqelssd(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, co(c1, cmap, csn(c2))), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, csn(c2)), w0)
  iunmapss(s0, c0, c1, csn(c2), c3, c4, w0)

  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, csn(c2)))), wrex(hs1, ciun(s0, c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, ciun(s0, c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, csn(c2))), wceq(co(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cmap, csn(c2)), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, ciun(s0, c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))))
  mapsnd(hs0, hs1, ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2, universe, c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c4)))
  ralrimi(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c4))

  rexlimdv(hs1, ciun(s0, c0, c1), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))))
  mpd(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  3ad2ant2(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))

  nf3an(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  nfel(s0, cv(hs1), ciun(s0, c0, c1))

  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))))

  3adant2(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))))

  sylibr(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))
  ancoms(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1))))))
  rspe(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))))

  3adant1r(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))))), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2))))

  eqcomd(cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(cop(c2, cv(hs1)))))), co(c1, cmap, csn(c2)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mapsnd(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c5))

blocks.name: rnmpt0
blocks.content: The range of a function in maps-to notation is empty if and only if its domain is empty. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmpt0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(crn(c0), emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrrd(w0, wceq(crn(c0), emptycls), wceq(c1, emptycls), wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls))
  eqeq1d(c1, emptycls, cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w0)
  eqcomd(c1, cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  dmmptg(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, wb(wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls), wceq(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls)))
  dm0rn0(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  eqeq1d(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), emptycls, crn(c0), w0)
  eqcomd(crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), crn(c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(crn(c0), crn(cmpt(s0, c1, c2))))
  rneqi(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmpt0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(ran(c0)= ∅ ↔ c1 = ∅))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitrrd(w0, ran(c0)= ∅, c1 = ∅, dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅, ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅)
  eqeq1d(c1, emptycls, dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), w0)
  eqcomd(c1, dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ c3)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  dmmptg(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  a1i(w0, (dom((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅ ↔ ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))= ∅))
  dm0rn0((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqeq1d(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), emptycls, ran(c0), w0)
  eqcomd(ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)), ran(c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, ran(c0)= ran((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))
  rneqi(c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
}

blocks.name: dmmptdf
blocks.content: The domain of the mapping operation, deduction form. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmmptdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  elex(c2, c3)
  rabid2(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmmptdf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)= c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6reqr(dom(c0), c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c3)
  elex(c2, c3)
  rabid2(s0, c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm fco3(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), cima(ccnv(c1), cdm(c0)), crn(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c1))
} = {
  fssd(ccom(c0, c1), cima(ccnv(c1), cdm(c0)), crn(c0), crn(ccom(c0, c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), cima(ccnv(c1), cdm(c0)), crn(ccom(c0, c1))), wf(ccom(c0, c1), cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1))))
  sylib(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1))), wfun(ccom(c0, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wfun(ccom(c0, c1)), wfun(c0), wfun(c1))
  funco(c0, c1)
  fdmrn(ccom(c0, c1))
  a1i(w0, wb(wf(ccom(c0, c1), cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1))), wf(ccom(c0, c1), cima(ccnv(c1), cdm(c0)), crn(ccom(c0, c1)))))
  feq2i(ccom(c0, c1), cdm(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(ccom(c0, c1)), cima(ccnv(c1), cdm(c0)))
  dmco(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wss(crn(ccom(c0, c1)), crn(c0)))
  rncoss(c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fco3(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 ∘ c1):(`' c1 " dom(c0))→ ran(c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c1))
} = {
  fssd((c0 ∘ c1), (`' c1 " dom(c0)), ran(c0), ran((c0 ∘ c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, ((c0 ∘ c1):(`' c1 " dom(c0))→ ran((c0 ∘ c1))), ((c0 ∘ c1): dom((c0 ∘ c1))→ ran((c0 ∘ c1))))
  sylib(w0, ((c0 ∘ c1): dom((c0 ∘ c1))→ ran((c0 ∘ c1))), Fun((c0 ∘ c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, Fun((c0 ∘ c1)), Fun(c0), Fun(c1))
  funco(c0, c1)
  fdmrn((c0 ∘ c1))
  a1i(w0, (((c0 ∘ c1): dom((c0 ∘ c1))→ ran((c0 ∘ c1)))↔((c0 ∘ c1):(`' c1 " dom(c0))→ ran((c0 ∘ c1)))))
  feq2i((c0 ∘ c1), dom((c0 ∘ c1)), ran((c0 ∘ c1)), (`' c1 " dom(c0)))
  dmco(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, ran((c0 ∘ c1))⊆ ran(c0))
  rncoss(c0, c1)
}

thm elrnmpt2id(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), crn(c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), crn(c4)), wfn(c4, cxp(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wfn(c4, cxp(c0, c1)))
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  simp1(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))))
  simp2(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))))
  fnovrn(c4, c0, c1, cv(s0), cv(s1))
}

thm elrnmpt2id(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)))→(s0[c4]s1)∈ ran(c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  syl3anc((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3))), (s0[c4]s1)∈ ran(c4), c4[Fn](c0 × c1), s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  3ad2ant3(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)), c4[Fn](c0 × c1))
  fnmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  simp1(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)))
  simp2(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)))

blocks.name: axccd
blocks.content: An alternative version of the axiom of countable choice. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm axccd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cen, com))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  mpd(w0, wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cen, com))
  syl(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cen, com))
  simpld(wbr(c0, cen, com), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(com, universe))
  encv(c0, com)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wi(wbr(c0, cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, cv(hs0), wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wbr(c0, cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, cen, com)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  raleq(s1, cv(hs0), c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  ax-cc(hs0, s0, s1)
  eximdv(s0, w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  ex(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  ralrimi(s1, c0, wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  nfan(s1, w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfra1(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  ex(wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  mpd(wa(wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  adantlr(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  adantll(w0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  rspa(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wbr(c0, cen, com), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: axccd2
blocks.content: An alternative version of the axiom of countable choice. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm axccd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wbr(c0, csdm, com))
  mpd(wa(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wex(s0, wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))))
  choicefi(s0, s1, c0, cv(s1), c0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com)))
  adantl(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com), wcel(c0, cfn))
  isfinite2(c0)
  simpr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  eximdv(s0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wi(wa(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))))
  simpr(wfn(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  syldan(w0, wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wex(s0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wbr(c0, cen, com))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com))), wbr(c0, cen, com), wa(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com))))
  anim1i(w0, wn(wbr(c0, csdm, com)), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  bren2(c0, com)
  axccd(s0, s1, c0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cen, com)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, cen, com))
  adantlr(w0, wbr(c0, cen, com), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), emptycls))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, csdm, com)
  diff.csdm.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wbr(c0, csdm, com))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, csdm, com)
  diff.csdm.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wbr(c0, cen, com))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cen, com)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wbr(c0, cen, com))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, cen, com)
  diff.cen.s(s1)
  diff.com.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axccd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[≼]_om)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ s1 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dan(w0, ∃(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)), c0[≺]_om)
  mpd((w0 ∧ c0[≺]_om), ∃(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)), ∃(s0,(s0[Fn]c0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1))))
  choicefi(s0, s1, c0, s1, c0, (w0 ∧ c0[≺]_om))
  adantl(w0, c0[≺]_om, c0 ∈ Fin)
  isfinite2(c0)
  simpr((w0 ∧ c0[≺]_om), s1 ∈ c0)
  adantlr(w0, c0[≺]_om, s1 ∈ c0, s1 ≠ ∅)
  eximdv(s0, (w0 ∧ c0[≺]_om), (s0[Fn]c0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1))
  a1i((w0 ∧ c0[≺]_om), ((s0[Fn]c0 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1))→ ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)))
  simpr(s0[Fn]c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1))
  syldan(w0, ¬ c0[≺]_om, ∃(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0 ` s1)∈ s1)), c0[≅]_om)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ ¬ c0[≺]_om), c0[≅]_om, (c0[≼]_om ∧ ¬ c0[≺]_om))
  anim1i(w0, ¬ c0[≺]_om, c0[≼]_om)
  bren2(c0, com)
  axccd(s0, s1, c0, (w0 ∧ c0[≅]_om))
  simpr(w0, c0[≅]_om)
  adantlr(w0, c0[≅]_om, s1 ∈ c0, s1 ≠ ∅)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0[≺]_om)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, csdm, com)
  diff.csdm.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0[≺]_om)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, csdm, com)
  diff.csdm.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0[≅]_om)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cen, com)
  diff.cen.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0[≅]_om)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, cen, com)
  diff.cen.s(s1)
  diff.com.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: funimassd
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for the image of a function being a subclass. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm funimassd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssd(hs0, cima(c0, c1), c2, w0)
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wfun(c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wfun(c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)))
  fvelima(s0, c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  rexlimd(s0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))
  3ad2ant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqcomd(cv(hs0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  id(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cima(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cima(c0, c1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funimassd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 " c1)⊆ c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s0)∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  ssd(hs0, (c0 " c1), c2, w0)
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0 " c1)), hs0 ∈ c2, ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0 " c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)= hs0), Fun(c0), hs0 ∈(c0 " c1))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0 " c1), Fun(c0))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0 " c1))
  fvelima(s0, c0, hs0, c1)
  rexlimd(s0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c0 " c1)), (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(c0 " c1))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈(c0 " c1))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(c0 " c1), (s0 ∈ c1 →((c0 ` s0)= hs0 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  3exp(w0, s0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  eqeltrd(hs0, c2, (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1 ∧(c0 ` s0)= hs0))
  3ad2ant3(w0, s0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, hs0 =(c0 ` s0))
  eqcomd(hs0, (c0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  id((c0 ` s0)= hs0)
  3adant3(w0, s0 ∈ c1, (c0 ` s0)= hs0, (c0 ` s0)∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 " c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c0 " c1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: feqresmptf
blocks.content: Express a restricted function as a mapping. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm feqresmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  feqmptdf(s0, cres(c0, c1), c1, c3, w0)
  nfres(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  fssresd(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c1, cfv(cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))
  fvres(cv(s0), c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm feqresmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 |` c1)=(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c2 → c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6eq((c0 |` c1), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0 ` s0)), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦((c0 |` c1)` s0)), w0)
  feqmptdf(s0, (c0 |` c1), c1, c3, w0)
  nfres(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  fssresd(c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c1, ((c0 |` c1)` s0), (c0 ` s0))
  fvres(s0, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: dmmptdf2
blocks.content: The domain of the mapping operation, deduction form. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmmptdf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
} = {
  syl6reqr(cdm(c0), c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))), wral(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe)))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, c3))
  elex(c2, c3)
  rabid2f(s0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmmptdf2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)= c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
} = {
  syl6reqr(dom(c0), c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | c2 ∈ 𝕌 }, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  ralrimi(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ c3)
  elex(c2, c3)
  rabid2f(s0, c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  dmmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm fmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c3, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c3, c0, c2), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2)))
  cbvral(s0, hs0, c0, wcel(c1, c2), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2))
  nfv(hs0, wcel(c1, c2))
  nfel(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2)
  eleq1d(c1, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3)
  eqtri(c3, cmpt(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fmptf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)↔(c3 : c0 → c2))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2), (c3 : c0 → c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c2))
  cbvral(s0, hs0, c0, c1 ∈ c2, [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ c2)
  nfv(hs0, c1 ∈ c2)
  nfel(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2)
  eleq1d(c1, c2, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  fmpt(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3)
  eqtri(c3, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦[hs0 / s0]c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  cbvmpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm mptssid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  mpbir(wceq(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  ax-gen(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  ax-gen(hs0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c2, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe)))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  simpl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c1, universe))
  eqvisset(hs0, c1)
  rabid(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sseldi(cv(s0), c0, c2, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eqsstri(c2, c0, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe)))
  ssrab2f(s0, c0, wcel(c1, universe))
  id(wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eqopab2b(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c2, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mptssid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)=(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ c2 = { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1)})
  mpbir({ < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)} = { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1)}, ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)↔(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1)))))
  ax-gen(s0, ∀(hs0,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)↔(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1))))
  ax-gen(hs0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1)↔(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1)))
  impbii((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  jca((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), s0 ∈ c2, hs0 = c1)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c2, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  sylibr((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 }, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  jca((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpl(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  adantl(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqvisset(hs0, c1)
  rabid(s0, c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpr(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  jca((s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1), s0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  adantr(s0 ∈ c2, hs0 = c1, s0 ∈ c0)
  sseldi(s0, c0, c2, s0 ∈ c2)
  eqsstri(c2, c0, { s0 ∈ c0 | c1 ∈ 𝕌 })
  ssrab2f(s0, c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  id(s0 ∈ c2)
  simpr(s0 ∈ c2, hs0 = c1)
  eqopab2b(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 = c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs0 = c1))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, c2, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

thm rnmptlb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  mpd(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  sylib(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  cbvrexv(s0, hs0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  ralbidv(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  breq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cle, c1)
  reximdva(hs0, cr, w0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wi(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))))
  exp31(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))))
  ralrimiva(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  syldan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  adantl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  elrnmpt(s2, cv(s1), universe, cmpt(s2, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))
  adantll(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  imp(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  rexlimd(s2, c0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  nfra1(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  nfv(s2, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  3exp(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  breqtrrd(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1), c1, w3a(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  3adant3(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  rspa(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  simp3(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  cbvrexv(hs0, s0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  ralbidv(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(hs0), cle, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(hs0), cle, c1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cle.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1))))
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1)))
  diff.crn.s(s0, cmpt(s2, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(hs0), cle, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptlb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1)))
  mpd(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)))
  sylib(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1)))
  cbvrexv(s0, hs0, cr, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1))
  ralbidv(s2, c0, s0 = hs0, s0[≤]c1, hs0[≤]c1)
  breq1(s0, hs0, cle, c1)
  reximdva(hs0, cr, w0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1))
  imp(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)→ ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1)))
  exp31(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1))
  ralrimiva(s1, ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), hs0[≤]s1)
  syldan(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]s1, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  adantl(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  biimpi(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  ax-mp((s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)), s1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s1)
  elrnmpt(s2, s1, universe, (s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  adantll((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1), hs0[≤]s1)
  imp(∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1), hs0[≤]s1)
  rexlimd(s2, c0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), s1 = c1, hs0[≤]s1)
  nfra1(s2, c0, hs0[≤]c1)
  nfv(s2, hs0[≤]s1)
  3exp(∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1, hs0[≤]s1)
  breqtrrd(hs0, cle, s1, c1, (∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)∧ s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  3adant3(∀(s2 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1), s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1, hs0[≤]c1)

thm rnmptbddlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))))
  reximdva(s0, cr, w0, wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wral(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))))
  ralrimiva(s1, crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  syldan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  adantl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(s1), crn(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s1)
  elrnmpt(s2, cv(s1), universe, cmpt(s2, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s2, c0, c1))
  imp(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s2, c0, wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  rexlimd(s2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  nfan(s2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  nfan(s2, w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  nfv(s2, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  nfra1(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  nfv(s2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wi(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3exp(wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  3adant3(wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  rspa(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  simp3(wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  eqbrtrd(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0), c1, wa(wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  simpr(wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  simpl(wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wral(s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c1, cle, cv(s0))
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), cr)
  diff.cr.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), cle, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm rnmptbddlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ F/(s2, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s1[≤]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)))
  reximdva(s0, cr, w0, ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s1[≤]s0))
  ex((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s1[≤]s0))
  ralrimiva(s1, ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), s1[≤]s0)
  syldan(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s1[≤]s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  adantl(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  biimpi(s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1))
  ax-mp((s1 ∈ ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))↔ ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)), s1 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(s1)
  elrnmpt(s2, s1, universe, (s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c0, c1)
  eqid((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  imp(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), ∃(s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1), s1[≤]s0)
  rexlimd(s2, c0, ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), s1 = c1, s1[≤]s0)
  nfan(s2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0))
  nfan(s2, w0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfv(s2, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  nfra1(s2, c0, c1[≤]s0)
  nfv(s2, s1[≤]s0)
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), (s2 ∈ c0 →(s1 = c1 → s1[≤]s0)))
  3exp(∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1, s1[≤]s0)
  syl2anc((∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)∧ s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 = c1), s1[≤]s0, c1[≤]s0, s1 = c1)
  3adant3(∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1, c1[≤]s0)
  rspa(s2, c0, c1[≤]s0)
  simp3(∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), s2 ∈ c0, s1 = c1)
  eqbrtrd(s1, cle, s0, c1, (c1[≤]s0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  simpr(c1[≤]s0, s1 = c1)
  simpl(c1[≤]s0, s1 = c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s2 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.wral.s(s1, s2, c0, c1[≤]s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c1, cle, s0)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s1, cle, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cle.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)))
  diff.crn.s(s1, (s2 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s2, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(s1[≤]s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, hs0, cle, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cle.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptima2
blocks.content: Image of a function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptima2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cima(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(cima(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cima(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2), crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1))))
  mptima(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1), cmpt(s0, c2, c1), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, cin(c0, c2), c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(c0, c2), c2), wss(c2, c0))
  biimpi(wss(c2, c0), wceq(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  sseqin2(c2, c0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mptima2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)" c2)= ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)" c2), ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), ran((s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)↦ c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)" c2)= ran((s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)↦ c1)))
  mptima(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  rneqd((s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)↦ c1), (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), w0)
  mpteq1d(s0, (c0 ⋂ c2), c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ⋂ c2)= c2, c2 ⊆ c0)
  biimpi(c2 ⊆ c0, (c0 ⋂ c2)= c2)
  sseqin2(c2, c0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

thm fvelimad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cima(c2, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3)), wrex(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  mpd(w0, wrex(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)), wrex(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)))
  syl(w0, wrex(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)), wcel(c3, cima(c2, c1)))
  ibi(wcel(c3, cima(c2, c1)), wrex(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)))
  elimag(hs0, c3, cima(c2, c1), c2, c1)
  rexlimd(hs0, c1, w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wrex(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfre1(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wrex(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)))
  syl2anc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)), wrex(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))
  elind(cv(hs0), c0, c1, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)))
  3adant2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), c0, cdm(c2), wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c3, cima(c2, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  a1i(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  adantr(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wcel(c3, cima(c2, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  breldmg(cv(hs0), universe, c3, cima(c2, c1), c2)
  adantr(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wceq(cdm(c2), c0))
  fndmd(c2, c0, w0)
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  sylc(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3), wfun(c2), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3), wfun(c2))
  syl(w0, wfun(c2), wfn(c2, c0))
  fnfun(c2, c0)
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, c3))
  funbrfv(c2, cv(hs0), c3)
  rspe(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, cin(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3))
  nfv(hs0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  nfeq(s0, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c3)
  nffv(s0, c2, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fvelimad(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2[Fn]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(c2 " c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, ∃(s0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` s0)= c3), ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` hs0)= c3))
  mpd(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` hs0)= c3), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3))
  syl(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3), c3 ∈(c2 " c1))
  ibi(c3 ∈(c2 " c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3))
  elimag(hs0, c3, (c2 " c1), c2, c1)
  rexlimd(hs0, c1, w0, hs0[c2]c3, ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` hs0)= c3))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfre1(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c2 ` hs0)= c3)
  3exp(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3, ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` hs0)= c3))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0[c2]c3), ∃(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1),(c2 ` hs0)= c3), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), (c2 ` hs0)= c3)
  elind(hs0, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0[c2]c3))
  3adant2(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleqtrd(hs0, c0, dom(c2), (w0 ∧ hs0[c2]c3))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ hs0[c2]c3), hs0 ∈ dom(c2), hs0 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈(c2 " c1), hs0[c2]c3)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0[c2]c3), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  adantr(w0, hs0[c2]c3, c3 ∈(c2 " c1))
  simpr(w0, hs0[c2]c3)
  breldmg(hs0, universe, c3, (c2 " c1), c2)
  adantr(w0, hs0[c2]c3, dom(c2)= c0)
  fndmd(c2, c0, w0)
  simp2(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3)
  sylc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0[c2]c3), (c2 ` hs0)= c3, Fun(c2), hs0[c2]c3)
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3, Fun(c2))
  syl(w0, Fun(c2), c2[Fn]c0)
  fnfun(c2, c0)
  simp3(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0[c2]c3)
  funbrfv(c2, hs0, c3)
  rspe(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c2 ` hs0)= c3)
  cbvrex(s0, hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c2 ` s0)= c3, (c2 ` hs0)= c3)
  nfv(hs0, (c2 ` s0)= c3)
  nfeq(s0, (c2 ` hs0), c3)
  nffv(s0, c2, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  fveqeq2(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c2 ` s0)= c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: funimaeq
blocks.content: Membership relation for the values of a function whose image is a subclass. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm funimaeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cima(c0, c1), cima(c2, c1)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqssd(cima(c0, c1), cima(c2, c1), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), cima(c2, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c2, c1))))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c2, c1)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c2, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cima(c2, c1)), wfn(c2, cdm(c2)), wss(c1, cdm(c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wfn(c2, cdm(c2)))
  funfnd(c2, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c1, cdm(c2)))
  fnfvima(c2, cdm(c2), c1, cv(s0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), cima(c2, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c2, c1)))), wfun(c0), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  funimass4(s0, c0, c1, cima(c2, c1))
  mpbird(w0, wss(cima(c2, c1), cima(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cima(c0, c1))))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cima(c0, c1)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cima(c0, c1), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  eqcomd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cima(c0, c1)), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)), wss(c1, cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wfn(c0, cdm(c0)))
  funfnd(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wss(c1, cdm(c0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  fnfvima(c0, cdm(c0), c1, cv(s0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wss(cima(c2, c1), cima(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cima(c0, c1)))), wfun(c2), wss(c1, cdm(c2)))
  funimass4(s0, c2, c1, cima(c0, c1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm funimaeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 " c1)=(c2 " c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ dom(c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s0)=(c2 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqssd((c0 " c1), (c2 " c1), w0)
  mpbird(w0, (c0 " c1)⊆(c2 " c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈(c2 " c1)))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈(c2 " c1))
  eqeltrd((c0 ` s0), (c2 " c1), (c2 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c2 ` s0)∈(c2 " c1), c2[Fn]dom(c2), c1 ⊆ dom(c2), s0 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2[Fn]dom(c2))
  funfnd(c2, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ dom(c2))
  fnfvima(c2, dom(c2), c1, s0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0 " c1)⊆(c2 " c1)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈(c2 " c1))), Fun(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  funimass4(s0, c0, c1, (c2 " c1))
  mpbird(w0, (c2 " c1)⊆(c0 " c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` s0)∈(c0 " c1)))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, (c2 ` s0)∈(c0 " c1))
  eqeltrd((c2 ` s0), (c0 " c1), (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  eqcomd((c2 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c0 ` s0)∈(c0 " c1), c0[Fn]dom(c0), c1 ⊆ dom(c0), s0 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c0[Fn]dom(c0))
  funfnd(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c1 ⊆ dom(c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  fnfvima(c0, dom(c0), c1, s0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c2 " c1)⊆(c0 " c1)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c2 ` s0)∈(c0 " c1))), Fun(c2), c1 ⊆ dom(c2))
  funimass4(s0, c2, c1, (c0 " c1))
  diff.cima.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.cima.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rnmptbd2lem
blocks.content: Boundness below of the range of a function in maps-to notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmptbd2lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))))
  ex(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))))
  imp(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))))
  reximdv(s0, cr, w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))
  ex(w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))
  ralrimiva(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))
  syldan(wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(s2), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(s2), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s2), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cv(s2), crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1))), wcel(cv(s2), universe))
  vex(s2)
  elrnmpt(s1, cv(s2), universe, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), c0, c1)
  adantll(w0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))
  imp(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))
  rexlimd(s1, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(cv(s2), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))
  nfra1(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))

thm rnmptbd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))))

  breq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cle, c1)
  rnmptbd2lem(hs0, s1, hs1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, wb(wrex(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))))
  cbvrexv(hs0, s0, cr, wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))))
  bitrd(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))), wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2))), wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs1))))
  ralbidv(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs1)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cle, cv(hs1))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs1))), wral(s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))))
  cbvralv(hs1, s2, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)))
  breq2(cv(hs1), cv(s2), cv(s0), cle)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(hs0), cle, c1)

thm rnmptbd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2))))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitrd(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]hs1)))
  a1i(w0, (∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1))↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1))))
  cbvrexv(s0, hs0, cr, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, hs0[≤]c1))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, s0 = hs0, s0[≤]c1, hs0[≤]c1)
  breq1(s0, hs0, cle, c1)
  rnmptbd2lem(hs0, s1, hs1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  a1i(w0, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]hs1))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2))))
  cbvrexv(hs0, s0, cr, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]hs1), ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2))
  bitrd(hs0 = s0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]hs1), ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2), ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]hs1))
  ralbidv(hs1, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0 = s0, hs0[≤]hs1, s0[≤]hs1)
  breq1(hs0, s0, cle, hs1)
  a1i(hs0 = s0, (∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]hs1)↔ ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2)))
  cbvralv(hs1, s2, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]hs1, s0[≤]s2)
  breq2(hs1, s2, s0, cle)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, c0, hs0[≤]c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, cle, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0[≤]c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s0[≤]s2))
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs0[≤]hs1)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, hs0, cle, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: infnsuprnmpt
blocks.content: The indexed infimum of real numbers is the negative of the indexed supremum of the negative values. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm infnsuprnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt), cneg(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))), cr, clt))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtrd(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt), cneg(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))), cr, clt)), cneg(csup(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), cr, clt)), cneg(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))), cr, clt)), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt), cneg(csup(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), cr, clt))), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wne(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), emptycls), wrex(s1, cr, wral(hs1, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  rnmptlb(s1, hs1, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  infrenegsup(s1, hs1, hs0, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  negeqd(csup(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), cr, clt), csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))), cr, clt), w0)
  supeq1d(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), cr, clt, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)))), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1))))))
  impbid(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)))))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)))))
  elrnmptd(s0, cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), c0, cneg(c1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cneg(c1))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cneg(cv(hs0)), c1)))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))))), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cneg(cv(hs0)), c1)), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))))

blocks.name: suprclrnmpt
blocks.content: Closure of the indexed supremum of a nonempty bounded set of reals. Range of a function in maps-to notation can be used, to express an indexed supremum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm suprclrnmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csup(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, clt), cr))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  suprcld(s1, hs0, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  rnmptssd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cr, c0, c1, w0)
  rnmptn0(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, cr, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  rnmptbdd(s1, hs0, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crn.s(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s2[≤]s0))))

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

  ⊣ d(s2, c0)

  3bitrd(w0, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s2[≤]s0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0)))

  cbvrexv(s0, hs0, cr, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]s0), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1[≤]hs0))
