  breq2(s0, hs0, c1, cle)
  rnmptbdlem(hs0, s1, hs1, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  a1i(w0, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0))↔ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s2[≤]s0))))
  cbvrexv(hs0, s0, cr, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0), ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s2[≤]s0))
  bitrd(hs0 = s0, ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0), ∀(s2 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), s2[≤]s0), ∀(hs1 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]s0))

  cbvralv(hs1, s2, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]s0, s2[≤]s0)
  breq1(hs1, s2, cle, s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)

  diff.wral.s(s0, hs1, ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), hs1[≤]hs0)
  diff.crn.s(s0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))

blocks.name: rnmptss2
blocks.content: The range of an operation given by the maps-to notation as a subset. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rnmptssdf(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, c2, c1)), c0, c1, w0)
  nfrn(s0, cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  elrnmpt1d(s0, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  rnmptssdf(s0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), ran((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1)), c0, c1, w0)
  nfrn(s0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1))
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  elrnmpt1d(s0, c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1), c2, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c1))
  sselda(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.content: A restricted quantifier over an image set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralrnmpt3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wral(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  syl(w0, wb(wral(s0, crn(cmpt(s1, c0, c1)), w1), wral(s1, c0, w2)), wral(s1, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  ralrimia(s1, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  ralrnmpt(s1, s0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(s1, c0, c1), w1, w2)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c0, c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralrnmpt3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(∀(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w1)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w2)))
  ⊣ F/(s1, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  syl(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ ran((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w1)↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, w2)), ∀(s1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2))
  ralrimia(s1, c0, w0, c1 ∈ c2)
  ralrnmpt(s1, s0, c0, c1, c2, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), w1, w2)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, s1, c0, c1)
}

thm fvelima2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3))), wrex(s0, cin(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylan2(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, cin(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))))
  sylib(wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))
  mpbid(wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3)), wrex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3)))
  id(wcel(c2, cima(c0, c3)))
  elimag(s0, c2, cima(c0, c3), c0, c3)
  df-rex(s0, c3, wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))
  sylibr(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)))), wrex(s0, cin(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  imp(wfn(c0, c1), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))))
  eximdv(s0, wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  ex(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2)))
  jca(wa(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c1, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  elind(cv(s0), c1, c3, wa(wfn(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))))
  adantrl(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  fnbr(c0, c1, cv(s0), c2)
  simprl(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2))
  adantrl(wfn(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  sylan(wfn(c0, c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2), wfun(c0))
  fnfun(c0, c1)
  imp(wfun(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, c2), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  funbrfv(c0, cv(s0), c2)
  df-rex(s0, cin(c1, c3), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.wfn.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rnmptssbi
blocks.content: The range of an operation given by the maps-to notation as a subset. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmptssbi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(crn(c0), c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbida(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c1)))
  ralrimia(s0, c2, wa(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1)), wcel(c3, c1))
  nfan(s0, w0, wss(crn(c0), c1))
  nfss(s0, crn(c0), c1)
  nfrn(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  sseldd(c3, c1, crn(c0), wa(wa(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  simplr(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  elrnmpt1d(s0, c3, c0, c2, c4, wa(wa(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  adantlr(w0, wss(crn(c0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantl(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c1)), wss(crn(c0), c1))
  rnmptss(s0, c2, c3, c1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmptssbi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(ran(c0)⊆ c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  impbida(w0, ran(c0)⊆ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c1))
  ralrimia(s0, c2, (w0 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1), c3 ∈ c1)
  nfan(s0, w0, ran(c0)⊆ c1)
  nfss(s0, ran(c0), c1)
  nfrn(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  nfmpt1(s0, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  sseldd(c3, c1, ran(c0), ((w0 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  simplr(w0, ran(c0)⊆ c1, s0 ∈ c2)
  elrnmpt1d(s0, c3, c0, c2, c4, ((w0 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  simpr((w0 ∧ ran(c0)⊆ c1), s0 ∈ c2)
  adantlr(w0, ran(c0)⊆ c1, s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  adantl(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c1), ran(c0)⊆ c1)
  rnmptss(s0, c2, c3, c1, c0)
}

blocks.name: fnfvima2
blocks.content: Given an element of the preimage, its function value is in the image. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnfvima2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
} = {
  sseldd(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, c2), cima(c0, cin(c3, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(cima(c0, cin(c3, c2)), cima(c0, c2)))
  ax-mp(wss(cima(c0, cin(c3, c2)), cima(c0, c2)), wss(cin(c3, c2), c2))
  inss2(c3, c2)
  imass2(cin(c3, c2), c2, c0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cima(c0, cin(c3, c2))), wfn(c0, c3), wss(cin(c3, c2), c3), wcel(c1, cin(c3, c2)))
  a1i(w0, wss(cin(c3, c2), c3))
  inss1(c3, c2)
  elind(c1, c3, c2, w0)
  fnfvima(c0, c3, cin(c3, c2), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnfvima2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈(c0 " c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
} = {
  sseldd((c0 ` c1), (c0 " c2), (c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2))⊆(c0 " c2))
  ax-mp((c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2))⊆(c0 " c2), (c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ c2)
  inss2(c3, c2)
  imass2((c3 ⋂ c2), c2, c0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)∈(c0 "(c3 ⋂ c2)), c0[Fn]c3, (c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ c3, c1 ∈(c3 ⋂ c2))
  a1i(w0, (c3 ⋂ c2)⊆ c3)
  inss1(c3, c2)
  elind(c1, c3, c2, w0)
  fnfvima(c0, c3, (c3 ⋂ c2), c1)
}

blocks.name: imassmpt
blocks.content: Membership relation for the values of a function whose image is a subclass. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm imassmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, cin(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c3, c1))), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, cin(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c2)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4)), c2))
  a1i(w0, wb(wss(cima(c0, c1), c2), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4)), c2)))
  sseq1i(cima(c0, c1), c2, crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4)))
  eqtri(cima(c0, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4)), crn(cres(c0, c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  rneqi(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4))
  eqtri(cres(c0, c1), cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4), cres(cmpt(s0, c3, c4), c1))
  reseq1i(c0, c1, cmpt(s0, c3, c4))
  resmpt3(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  rnmptssbi(s0, cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4), c2, cin(c3, c1), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cin(c3, c1), c4))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c3, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm imassmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 " c1)⊆ c2 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1), c4 ∈ c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1))→ c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, (c0 " c1)⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1), c4 ∈ c2), ran((s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4))⊆ c2)
  a1i(w0, ((c0 " c1)⊆ c2 ↔ ran((s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4))⊆ c2))
  sseq1i((c0 " c1), c2, ran((s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4)))
  eqtri((c0 " c1), ran((s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4)), ran((c0 |` c1)))
  df-ima(c0, c1)
  rneqi((c0 |` c1), (s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4))
  eqtri((c0 |` c1), (s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4), ((s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)|` c1))
  reseq1i(c0, c1, (s0 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  resmpt3(s0, c3, c4, c1)
  rnmptssbi(s0, (s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4), c2, (c3 ⋂ c1), c4, c5, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈(c3 ⋂ c1)↦ c4))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: fconst7
blocks.content: An alternative way to express a constant function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Feb-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm fconst7(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2))), wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)))
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2))))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c2), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, csn(c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  eqeltrrd(c2, universe, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  fvexd(c0, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  snidg(c2, universe)
  ffnfvf(s0, c0, c1, csn(c2))
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, csn(c2))
  syl(w0, wb(wf(c0, c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cxp(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(c2, c3))
  fconst2g(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fconst7(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 =(c1 × { c2 }))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Fn]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s0)= c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0 =(c1 × { c2 }), (c0 : c1 → { c2 }))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 → { c2 }), c0[Fn]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c1,(c0 ` s0)∈ { c2 }))
  ralrimia(s0, c1, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ { c2 })
  eqeltrd((c0 ` s0), { c2 }, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c2 ∈ { c2 }, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrrd(c2, universe, (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  fvexd(c0, s0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  snidg(c2, universe)
  ffnfvf(s0, c0, c1, { c2 })
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, { c2 })
  syl(w0, ((c0 : c1 → { c2 })↔ c0 =(c1 × { c2 })), c2 ∈ c3)
  fconst2g(c2, c3, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
